JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description:  

    Independently develop & test software applications keeping in mind the complete project lifecycle execution & the best coding practices keeping in mind the Agile development flow  

    Apply his/her knowledge of software development processes and contribute in developing functional specifications,  design specifications,  Unit & Integration test specifications.   

    Independently own modules within project and deliver their modules on time with very high quality.  Should implement the code and execute unit & integration test plans for the assigned modules.   

    Independently work and resolve problems found during internal testing & post product release.   

    Apply his/her knowledge on job and actively involved in coming with innovative solutions to problems.   

    Actively share information and communicate clearly to team members.   

    Adaptation capabilities of industry proven coding standards  

    Ability to ensure quality of deliverables  

    Code reviews,  Tracking bugs and Documentation,  Positive attitude,  Good Communication and Analytical skills  

 

  Technical Skills: 

  Microsoft . NET,  C#,  ASP. Net,  JavaScript,  OOPS/Design Pattern, Web services. Strong knowledge in SQL 2005,  XML,  AJAX is required.   

 

  Experience:  

    Hands-on Programming for 2-4yrs and greater than 4yrs
